duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and develop enterprise models using Power BI desktop.
Create and maintain ETL packages, OLAP cubes, and reports utilizing Power BI.
Document source-to-target mappings, data dictionaries, and database design.
Optimize data flows and identify areas of improvement.
Install and administer Microsoft SQL Server.
Support business development efforts and client presentations.
Thrive in a fast-paced, client-facing role delivering high-quality work products.
Demonstrate strong leadership, interpersonal, prioritization, and multi-tasking skills.
Adapt to new environments, people, technologies, and processes.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field (Master's preferred)
